com.skobbler.ngx.map

Class SKPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.skobbler.ngx.map.SKPolygon

  • public class SKPolygon
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores information related to a polygon. This object is used as an input parameter.
    Version:
    2.5

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SKPolygon() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float[] getColor()
      Gets the polygon color (RGBA array of values between 0 and 1).
      int getIdentifier()
      Gets the unique identifier for the overlay.
      float getMaskedObjectScale()
      Gets a value that indicates how much bigger should be the masked object (1 would be the same object, 0 means endless object).
      java.util.List<SKCoordinate> getNodes()
      Gets the list of polygon nodes
      float[] getOutlineColor()
      Gets the polygon outline color (RGBA array of values between 0 and 1).
      int getOutlineDottedPixelsSkip()
      Gets the number of pixels between the dotted lines.
      int getOutlineDottedPixelsSolid()
      Gets the number of pixels of a dotted line.
      int getOutlineSize()
      Gets the circle outline size.
      boolean isWithMask()
      Gets a boolean value that indicates whether the maskedObjectScale property was set.
      void setColor(float[] color)
      Sets the polygon color (RGBA array of values between 0 and 1).
      void setIdentifier(int identifier)
      Sets the unique identifier for the overlay.
      void setMaskedObjectScale(float maskedObjectScale)
      Sets a value that indicates how much bigger should be the masked object (1 would be the same object, 0 means endless object).
      void setNodes(java.util.List<SKCoordinate> nodes)
      Sets the list of polygon nodes
      void setOutlineColor(float[] outlineColor)
      Sets the polygon outline color (RGBA array of values between 0 and 1).
      void setOutlineDottedPixelsSkip(int outlineDottedPixelsSkip)
      Sets the number of pixels between the dotted lines.
      void setOutlineDottedPixelsSolid(int outlineDottedPixelsSolid)
      Sets the number of pixels of a dotted line.
      void setOutlineSize(int outlineSize)
      Sets the outline size (value between 1 and 10, otherwise no outline).
